scripts.dev: echo Available commands: && echo   npm run dev:server     - Start the MCP server in watch mode && echo   npm run dev:onboarding  - Start the onboarding UI && echo   npm run dist:win        - Build Windows installer && echo   npm run dist:mac        - Build macOS installer && echo   npm run dist:linux      - Build Linux installer && exit 1
scripts.dist:win: npm run build:win --workspace=packages/server-for-chrome-extension && npm run dist:win --workspace=packages/electron
scripts.dist:mac: npm run build:mac --workspace=packages/server-for-chrome-extension && npm run dist:mac --workspace=packages/electron
scripts.dist:linux: npm run build:linux --workspace=packages/server-for-chrome-extension && npm run dist:linux --workspace=packages/electron
